examples: The hotel's new restaurant comes highly recommended (= a lot of people have praised it).
El nuevo restaurante del hotel está muy recomendado (= mucha gente lo ha elogiado).
Can you recommend a good hotel?
I recommend the book to all my students.
Recomiendo el libro a todos mis alumnos.
She was recommended for the post by a colleague.
Un colega la recomendó para el puesto.
